page.title: 18LIFE STYLES
page.content:
SURVEY.NUMBER OF CHILDREN ASKED=1205 AGES FIVE YEARS TO ELEVEN YEARS. {DO YOU USE YOUR BICYCLE REGULARLY?} YES=77% {DO YOU A OWN VIDEO WHICH YOU WATCH } {REGULARLY? }YES=54% {DO YOU LEARN AND PLAY A MUSICAL {INSTRUMENT OUT OF SCHOOL?}YES=29% {DO YOU SPEND YOUR LEISURE TIME ALONE {OR WITH FRIENDS?}ALONE=24% FRIENDS=76% {DO YOU GO TO CHURCH OR SUNDAY SCHOOL {REGULARLY?}YES=32% {DO YOU HAVE A COMPUTER? }YES=45% {HOW MANY HOURS OF TV DO YOU WATCH {DAILY? } 1 hr. 2 hrs. 3hrs. 4hrs. 5 hrs. more 22% 31% 20% 11% 7% 9% {WHEN DO YOU GO TO BED? {BEFORE 7pm }6% {7-8pm - }20% {8-9pm }38% {later -} 36%
